However, simulations of such events in this region remain challenging due to uncertainties in the representation of cloud microphysics. While previous research has exposed the sensitivity of climate models to microphysics schemes, the atmospheric processes driving discrepancies in precipitation simulations are still not fully explored. In this study, we analyse two extreme precipitation events over the TP region using six different microphysics schemes in the Weather Research and Forecasting model (WRF). We assess how precipitation and related processes are represented across these schemes and identify key sources of uncertainties in precipitation simulations. Our findings reveal substantial variations in the location, intensity and timing of precipitation, with differences in accumulated amounts reaching up to 40 % depending on the microphysics scheme used. Further analysis shows that the timing and strength of convective activity are closely linked to precipitation patterns, leading to significant discrepancies across experiments. Additionally, the representation of horizontal water vapour transport plays a critical role in determining the location and intensity of precipitation by influencing moisture availability. Lastly, the modelling of cloud composition – particularly of solid-phase hydrometeors – emerges as a crucial factor in precipitation evolution, contributing substantially to the variability in simulated precipitation location and intensity.

explanation: 该研究论文主要关注利用C波段双极化雷达观测，研究印度中部季风核心区季风前对流云和冰雹天气的微物理特征。论文分析了季风前对流云的结构和演变，以及一次冰雹事件的微物理过程，重点关注冰雹/霰的形成机制（如冻结和吸积过程）以及雷达极化参数（如差分反射率、差分相位和相关系数）与这些过程的关系。该研究侧重于云微物理过程和雷达观测技术，与大气环境遥感技术（如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析）关联性不大。
topic_words: ['C-band dual-polarization radar', 'Hailstorm microphysics', 'Pre-monsoon convective clouds', 'Riming/accretion processes', 'Differential reflectivity (ZDR)', 'Specific differential phase (KDP)', 'Correlation coefficient (ρHV)']
authors: Kumar Abhijeet;Sachin M. Deshpande;G. Pandithurai
title: Polarimetric insights into pre-monsoon convective clouds and hail storm microphysics over central India using polarimetric radar observation
abstract:
•First observation of hail storm events over the monsoon core zone in central India using C-band dual polarization radar. •First report of microphysical study of hailstorm event and PMCCSs over central India using dual-pol radar observation. •In the monsoon core zone, the pre-monsoon convective cloud systems are intense and deep reaching to higher heights. •Pre-monsoon convective clouds are dominated by the riming/accretion products of dry hail/graupel above melting layer. 
 The present study characterizes the pre-monsoon convective clouds (PMCC) observed in the monsoon core zone and a hail-producing storm during the pre-monsoon month observed using C-band dual-polarization (CDPR) radar at the IITM's Atmospheric Research Testbed (ART) facility in Silkheda, 60 km north of Bhopal. The composite analysis of PMCC has shown that the maximum height of 35- and 50-dBZ echo tops (ETHs) is around 13 km and 11 km, respectively, indicating intense and deep convection. The mean value of Convective Available Potential Energy (CAPE) is also high for the pre-monsoon season. The composite contoured-frequency-by-altitude diagrams (CFADs) of PMCC show a high frequency of smaller values of differential reflectivity (ZDR ∼ 0 dB) and specific differential phase (KDP) above the melting layer, indicating that intense convective updrafts dominate the PMCC, causing hail/graupel particles to be rimmed heavily above the melting layer and reach greater heights. The wider distribution or higher values of ZH, ZDR, KDP, and small values of correlation coefficient ρHV (<0.95) near the surface indicate the presence of a rain-hail mixture during the pre-monsoon month.The microphysical characteristic of a hailstorm event that produced hailstones over Bhopal on 30th April 2023 is explored. It is found that the CAPE value was building up before the hailstorm event, and it was high just before the hailstone was observed over Bhopal. Time evolution of storms indicates the dominant presence of graupel/hail at 5-11 km. Graupel/hail will form due to the riming or accretion processes of cloud droplets, supercooled water, or ice particles. It has been observed that the riming process is dominant during the storm's evolution, which produces very low values of ZDR and KDP. The high value of ρHV (>0.99) at these altitudes suggests that the graupel/hail is dry. The updraft associated with a convectively unstable atmosphere exaggerates the growth of ice crystals by a rapid collection of supercooled water droplets. That ultimately led to forming graupel/hailstones through the riming process. The wet hailstones and large raindrops signatures close to the surface are also observed and are characterized by higher values of ZH (> 50 dBZ), enhanced ZDR (∼ 3–4 dB), and a depleted ρHV (< 0.95). Additionally, a KDP exceeding 1.8°/km near the surface indicates the process of hail melting/hail coated with water.

explanation: 该研究主要关注亚马逊地区对流冷池的特征及其对行星边界层湍流的影响。它使用微气象数据分析冷池的统计数据，并探讨冷池如何扰动边界层的演变以及增强湍流。虽然研究涉及大气过程，但它侧重于地面观测和局部现象，而不是大气环境遥感技术，如空气质量监测、卫星观测或大气成分分析。
authors: Maurício I. Oliveira;Luca Mortarini;Otávio C. Acevedo;Iván Mauricio Cely-Toro;Martina Grosso;Luciane I. Reis;Cléo Q. Dias-Júnior;Carlos A. Quesada;Bruno Z. Ribeiro;Daiane V. Brondani
title: Convective cold pools and attendant turbulence at the Amazon Tall Tower Observatory (ATTO)
abstract:
•The behavior of convective cold pools (CCPs) in the Amazon forest is analyzed. •An objective method applied to micrometeorological data yields a large CCP dataset. •CCPs disturb the evolution of the boundary layer, mainly above the forest canopy. •Turbulent fluxes are largely enhanced by CCPs despite the rain-cooled stable flow. 
 Deep moist convection significantly disturbs the evolution of the planetary boundary layer (PBL) through its convective cold pools (CCPs). This study investigates the statistics of CCPs and their impact on PBL turbulence as observed at the Amazon Tall Tower Observatory (ATTO) site. To obtain a large dataset of CCPs, we adapted an existing CCP-detection algorithm for use in multilevel, micrometeorological data. Application of the algorithm to ATTO observations collected from August 2021 through December 2023 resulted in a dataset consisting of 410 CCPs. CCPs occur nearly every other day at the ATTO site, although they are most common from April through September and are least common from December through March. The occurrence of CCPs is linked to the diurnal cycle of the PBL, with more events around 1800 UTC and the less events around 1100 UTC. The strength of CCP perturbations varies strongly as a function of the distance from the canopy. Above the canopy (approximately 37 m), CCPs exhibit well-defined gust fronts, marked by sharp drops in temperature and humidity, gusting winds, overturning circulations, and pressure rises. During gust front passages, sensible (latent) heat fluxes are briefly enhanced and subsequently invert sign (weaken) in the CCPs, as previously unstable (moister) PBLs become stable (drier). Turbulence is stronger and more anisotropic during gust fronts and just above the canopy due to mechanical drag. Anisotropic turbulence may be transported upward to 200 m by the gust fronts. Below the canopy, CCPs and attendant perturbations are drastically damped, except in high-end cases.

explanation: 该研究论文主要关注喀斯特地区日较差（DTR）的极端值及其与风速的关系，而非直接涉及大气环境遥感技术。虽然日较差和风速是气候变量，与大气环境有关，但论文的重点在于分析这些变量在特定地貌（喀斯特地貌）上的时空变化模式及其相互作用。论文没有提及空气质量监测、卫星观测或大气成分分析等遥感技术应用。因此，该论文与大气环境遥感技术的关联性较弱。
authors: Ruizhi Sun;Xushu Wu
title: Extremes of diurnal temperature range in karst regions: Definition, trends and interaction with wind speed
abstract:
•Extremes of diurnal temperature range (DTR) were defined and characterized. •Relationship between extreme DTR and daily maximum wind speed was investigated. •Most karst regions experienced increased extreme DTR during 1980–2022. •Daily maximum wind speed is generally strengthened along with larger DTR. •Daytime DTR extremes dominated North America and Europe. 
 Diurnal temperature range (DTR) is an important climate indicator that exerts substantial effects on society as well as the environment, particularly on karst landforms where the ecosystem is vulnerable and sensitive to DTR. However, the space-time pattern of extremes of DTR and their relationship with wind speed over global karst regions remain poorly understood. In this study, we defined DTR extremes and investigated the spatiotemporal patterns of warm-season extremes and their relationships with wind speeds across global karst regions during 1980–2022. Our results reveal that arid zones such as the Middle East and northwestern China exhibit large long-term mean DTR and DTR extremes. There is an increase in the frequency of DTR extremes for most regions, though pronounced regional divergence of DTR trends exists. The intensity of DTR extremes show apparent increasing trends in North America and Europe, but in other regions decreased trends are prevailing. For most regions worldwide, declining wind speed trends are discerned, though slight increases are observed in the western United States. Moreover, wind speed is generally strengthened along with larger DTR. Daytime DTR extremes dominate North America, Europe and south China, while nighttime extremes are likely to occur in the Middle East and Asia. These findings advance the understanding of DTR extremes in fragile karst ecosystems, which could help for region-specific climate adaptation strategies.

explanation: 该论文主要研究了东南亚地区雾天条件下IMERG降水数据的性能评估和偏差校正，侧重于降水量的估算和校正，而非大气环境遥感技术，如空气质量监测、卫星观测或大气成分分析。虽然使用了卫星数据，但其应用集中在水文气象领域，与大气环境遥感关系不大。
authors: Dachuan Wang;Chen Yu;Lin Yi;Gang Jiang;Hechen Zhang
title: Performance validation and bias correction of IMERG precipitation data under foggy meteorological conditions in Southeast Asia
abstract:
•Comprehensive evaluation of spatiotemporal performance of IMERG in Southeast Asia. •New perspective applied to analysis IMERG under foggy meteorological conditions. •The experiment on bias correction using neural networks for foggy conditions. 
 Although the satellite precipitation products (SPPs) have been extensively utilized, their performance under fog-affected conditions has not been evaluated. To address this issue, we evaluated the SPPs and improved bias correction for foggy meteorological conditions in Southeast Asia. Three running versions of the Integrated Multi-satellitE Retrievals for Global Precipitation Measurement (IMERG) were evaluated from 2014 to 2022 at the daily timescale. The assessment of the performance for Early-Run (ER), Late-Run (LR), and Final-Run (FR) was conducted based on statistical and categorical indicators. Then, the impact of foggy meteorological conditions on IMERG was analyzed. Finally, artificial neural networks (ANN) were employed to correct fog-affected estimates of precipitation. The main conclusions are: (1) The best performance is demonstrated by the FR, with a correlation coefficient (CC) of 0.443 and a probability of detection (POD) of 0.575. All running versions perform significantly better in the Indochinese Peninsula compared to the Southern Asia Archipelago. (2) Fog adversely affects the accuracy of IMERG precipitation estimates. In the FR, the presence of fog results in a decrease of 6.95 % in CC, and this effect intensifies during the rainy season, with fog reducing CC by 15.46 %. (3) Significant improvement is demonstrated by the ANN correction, enhancing CC by 27.46 % relative to the FR, with particular effectiveness for extreme precipitation overestimation. This study analyzed the performance of IMERG from the perspective of foggy meteorological conditions, providing a reference for researches under special weather conditions.

explanation: 该研究论文主要关注印度洋偶极子（IOD）和厄尔尼诺-南方涛动（ENSO）对拉尼娜现象的影响和预测。它分析了IOD和ENSO不同阶段的相互作用如何影响拉尼娜的形成，并探讨了相关的热力学驱动机制。虽然该研究涉及大气和海洋的相互作用，但它主要侧重于气候预测和海洋环流，与大气环境遥感技术（如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析）没有直接的强相关性。该研究更多地关注气候动力学和预测模型，而非大气成分的遥感测量。
topic_words: ['El Niño-Southern Oscillation (ENSO)', 'Indian Ocean Dipole (IOD)', 'La Niña', 'Climate Forecasting', 'Oceanic Advection', 'Surface Heat Flux']
authors: Jinhui Wen;Shouwen Zhang;Hua Jiang;Yongming Gai;Hui Wang
title: Interplay of Indo-Pacific precursors in La Niña forecasting: IOD-ENSO phase coupling and thermodynamic drivers
abstract:
•Initial pIOD & El Niño strength impacts La Niña probability. •Strong pIOD amplifies La Niña cold anomalies. •pIOD and El Niño: advection & heat flux drive cooling. •pIOD and Neutral: advection controls La Niña cooling. 
 The positive Indian Ocean Dipole (pIOD) acts as a key precursor to La Niña formation, yet the dynamical interactions between pIOD and concurrent El Niño-Southern Oscillation (ENSO) phases remain insufficiently understood. Through an analysis of reanalysis datasets and simulations from the Community Earth System Model Large Ensemble (CESM-LENS), this study demonstrates that 64.2 % of observed pIOD events coincide with concurrent El Niño, aligning with a frequency of 57.1 % in CESM-LENS simulations. The probability of subsequent La Niña development following pIOD-El Niño coexistence reaches 54.7 % in reanalysis data and 59.0 % in CESM-LENS simulations, escalating to 75.6 % for intense pIOD episodes and 82.5 % under conditions of concurrent strong El Niño events. Spatiotemporal analysis reveals distinct transition mechanisms governed by Pacific background states. During periods of pIOD-El Niño coexistence, oceanic advection (51.7 %) works synergistically with surface heat flux (22.2 %) to collectively dissipate warm anomalies. In contrast, under pIOD-Neutral conditions, intensified zonal advection (61.7 %) predominantly facilitates cooling processes. Two key findings emerge from this analysis: (1) The intensity of the pIOD directly modulates both the likelihood and magnitude of subsequent La Niña, with stronger initial pIOD substantially enhance development probabilities; (2) Concurrent ENSO states determine the dominant physical drivers at play—El Niño coexistence enabling a multi-mechanism cooling while Neutral conditions necessitate accelerated advective processes. These findings demonstrate that combinations of pIOD-ENSO phases create distinct thermodynamic pathways for initiating La Niña events, carrying significant implications for seasonal forecasting. The identified intensity-dependent relationships and phase-specific mechanisms provide a framework for improving climate predictability, particularly under evolving climate conditions that may alter tropical basin interactions.

explanation: 该研究论文主要关注华南地区季风和热带气旋降雨的雨滴谱特征。虽然研究使用了地面观测数据（2DVD）来分析雨滴大小分布，并讨论了降雨强度、动能和雷达反射率之间的关系，但它主要侧重于降雨微物理过程，而非大气环境遥感技术，如空气质量监测、卫星观测或大气成分分析。因此，该论文与大气环境遥感技术的关联性不强。
authors: Ruize Lai;Sheng Hu;Xiantong Liu;Hui Xiao;Huiqi Li
title: Raindrop size distribution of monsoon and tropical cyclone events over South China
abstract:
•Monsoon rainfall shows larger drops; tropical cyclone rainfall shows higher concentrations in South China. •Both monsoon and tropical cyclone convective rainfall show maritime convective rainfall features. •Raindrop size distributions vary in response to differing dynamic and thermodynamic conditions. 
 The rainy season in South China is predominantly influenced by monsoon and tropical cyclone (TC) weather systems. However, due to the lack of long-term observational data, the microphysical characteristics of raindrop size distributions (DSDs) associated with these systems remain insufficiently understood. This study utilizes five years (2016–2020) of 2DVD observations to analyze the differences in DSD characteristics of monsoon and TC rainfall. The results indicate that monsoon rainfall exhibits higher concentrations of medium to large raindrops (diameter > 2.1 mm), along with larger mean rainfall rates (R) and mass-weighted mean diameters (Dm), but lower normalized intercept parameters (Nw) compared to TC rainfall. Distinct differences in the mean normalized DSDs are observed between monsoon and TC rainfall. Convective rain under both systems shows the characteristics of maritime convective rain. Additionally, the relationships between kinetic energy (KE) and R, KE and Dm, as well as radar reflectivity (Z) and R, differ between monsoon and TC rainfall. TC events have relatively humid atmospheric conditions and higher wind speeds, resulting in the presence of a large number of small raindrops. These findings enhance understanding of the DSD characteristics under different synoptic regimes and provide valuable implications for improving rainfall KE estimation, DSD retrieval, and quantitative precipitation estimation over South China.

explanation: 该论文主要研究雷电放电过程的建模，特别是云地闪的模拟。它关注的是雷电通道的电荷中性、通道电位的变化以及先导的传播过程。虽然雷电与大气电场有关，但该研究并没有直接涉及大气环境遥感技术，如空气质量监测、卫星观测或大气成分分析。因此，它与大气环境遥感技术的关联性不强。
authors: Zhipeng Wang;Li Zhang;Jianguo Wang;Mi Zhou;Jinxin Cao;Yijun Huang
title: Adaptive lightning progressing stochastic model with charge neutrality constraint for large-domain cloud-to-ground discharge
abstract:
•The 3D model with AMR simulates intracloud discharge and lightning attachment. •A charge neutrality algorithm synchronously adjusts channel and ambient potential. •Basic leader connection scenarios of −CG flashes are reproduced and analyzed. •Leader propagation stages are associated with electric field zero-crossing points. 
 This paper presents a new three-dimensional (3D) adaptive lightning progressing stochastic model (ALPSM) that incorporates the adaptive mesh refinement (AMR) method to enable a compatible simulation of large-domain intracloud discharges and near-ground lightning leader attachment processes. A new self-consistent charge neutrality maintenance algorithm is proposed, which considers the internal electric field of the lightning channel and ensures synchronized adjustments of the channel potential with the ambient potential. The model successfully reproduces the reported leader connection scenarios during the negative cloud-to-ground (−CG) lightning attachment process and analyzes the spatiotemporal evolutionary process of leader propagation and channel potential variation. The simulation results reveal a series of interesting phenomena in leader propagation before grounding: initial bidirectional vertical propagation during channel potential rapidly adjusting from the initial value to the average of the positive and negative charge regions; horizontal multibranch propagation within charge regions where the most concentrated height of horizontal propagation corresponds to the vertical electric field zero-crossing points; and downward negative leader vertical propagation during the rapidly increasing channel potential period. The ALPSM model advances the lightning stochastic model simulation owing to the charge neutrality constraint and adaptive mesh refinement in large three-dimensional domains, which provides a further method for the lightning attachment process simulation.

explanation: 该论文主要关注雷达反射率资料的同化对短期强天气预报的影响。它使用一维贝叶斯方案反演雷达反射率中的伪湿度观测，并将其同化到三维变分框架中。研究重点在于通过同化雷达数据（反射率和径向速度）来改善数值天气预报的初始场，从而提高降水预报的准确性。论文还探讨了一种有效时间平移（VTS）方法，以增强反演数据库，进一步提高预报效果。虽然涉及大气观测，但其核心在于天气预报的改进，而非大气环境遥感技术的应用，例如空气质量监测、卫星观测或大气成分分析。
topic_words: ['Radar reflectivity', 'Numerical Weather Prediction', 'Quantitative Precipitation Forecast', 'Severe Weather', '1D Bayesian retrieval', '3D-Var', 'Radial Velocity', 'Pseudo-humidity']
authors: Lixin Song;Wei Han
title: The impact of assimilating radar reflectivity observations based on the 1D Bayesian retrieval and valid-time-shifting method on the short-term severe weather forecasts
abstract:
•A 1D + 3DVar scheme is employed to indirectly assimilate water vapor retrieved from radar reflectivity. •The joint assimilation of radial velocity and pseudo-humidity observations contributes to improved moisture condition. •A valid-time-shifting method is applied to augment the 1D retrieval database, enhancing precipitation forecast accuracy. 
 The assimilation of radar reflectivity plays a crucial role in improving the initial fields of numerical weather prediction (NWP). This study employs a one-dimensional (1D) Bayesian scheme to retrieve pseudo-humidity observations from radar reflectivity, which are subsequently assimilated within a three-dimensional variational (3D-Var) framework. The results demonstrate that under dry-biased background field, the joint assimilation of radial velocity and pseudo humidity observations more markedly enhances moisture condition compared to radial velocity assimilation alone, resulting in improved quantitative precipitation forecast skills. Additionally, a valid-time-shifting (VTS) method is implemented to augment a priori database in 1D Bayesian retrieval by introducing sub-ensembles before and after the analysis time, aiming to mitigate temporal and spatial displacement errors in the NWP system. Two assimilation experiments are conducted to evaluate the impact of the VTS scheme on severe convection prediction. It can be found that the VTS method improves consistency in thermodynamic and dynamic structures. The assessments of short-term precipitation forecasts confirm that the application of VTS scheme improves the prediction accuracy of precipitation intensity and spatial distribution.

explanation: 该研究主要关注未来气候变化情景下极端湿热指数（Humidex）的变化，探讨了在不同共享社会经济路径（SSP）下，全球及区域尺度上极端湿热指数的季节性变化。研究使用了来自15个高分辨率CMIP6模型的模拟数据，并分析了气温和相对湿度对湿热指数变化的相对贡献。虽然研究涉及大气温度和湿度，但其重点在于评估气候变化对人体热应力的影响，而非大气环境遥感技术本身，如空气质量监测、卫星观测或大气成分分析。
authors: Rishabh Kushwaha;Prashant Kumar;Yukiharu Hisaki
title: Global future heat stress projections: Regional variations of Humidex changes from high-resolution CMIP6 models
abstract:
•Heat stress intensifies by 5–9 °C under SSP5–8.5 across most land regions. •Dangerous Humidex Days rise by 60–80 in SH tropics during DJF under SSP5–8.5. •Extreme Humidex increases most in JJA over Eastern N. America and N. Asia. •Humidex anomalies amplify ∼2.9× in JJA from SSP1–2.6 to SSP5–8.5. •Air temperature dominates Humidex rise; humidity plays a secondary role. 
 This study investigates future projections of the extreme Humidex, a compound index integrating air temperature and relative humidity, as an indicator of heat stress under two Shared Socioeconomic Pathways (SSP1–2.6 and SSP5–8.5). Using multi-model ensemble simulations from 15 high-resolution CMIP6 models, we examine seasonal variations in the extreme Humidex at both global and regional scales across 21 land regions. The historical simulations from CMIP6 models were validated using ERA5 observational data, ensuring reliability and accuracy in model projections. Additionally, the climatology of Humidex values derived from MME simulations was compared with the climatology of the Heat Index obtained from MME simulations, revealing consistency between the two heat stress indicators. To quantify heat-related hazards, we calculate the number of seasonal Dangerous Humidex Days (DHDs). Furthermore, we assess the relative contributions of air temperature and relative humidity to projected changes in the extreme Humidex. The results reveal a marked intensification of heat stress under SSP5–8.5, with late-century (2080–2100) increases in the extreme Humidex reaching approximately 5 to 9 °C across most land regions, compared to around 1.5 to 3.5 °C under SSP1–2.6. The JJA season exhibits the greatest intensification, particularly over Eastern North America and Northern Asia. On average, DJF shows a 2.78-fold increase in Humidex anomalies, while JJA demonstrates an even larger amplification of approximately 2.90-fold when transitioning from a low to high-emission scenario. The number of seasonal Dangerous Humidex Days also increases significantly, with an additional 60 to 80 days during DJF across many tropical and subtropical regions of the Southern Hemisphere, and more than 80 additional days per JJA season in most tropical regions under the high-emission scenario. Sensitivity analyses indicate that air temperature is the dominant driver of future changes in the extreme Humidex, while relative humidity exerts a secondary but regionally important influence.

explanation: 该研究论文主要关注人工增雨技术，特别是通过吸湿性云播撒来影响云的微物理过程。研究结合了现场观测和数值模拟，探讨了云播撒如何改变云的液态水含量、水汽混合比以及雨滴的尺度分布。虽然该研究涉及大气过程，但它更侧重于天气改造而非大气环境遥感技术，如空气质量监测、卫星观测或大气成分分析。
topic_words: ['cloud seeding', 'hygroscopic seeding', 'cloud microphysics', 'weather modification', 'drop size distribution']
authors: Kai-I Lin;Sheng-Hsiang Wang;Kao-Shen Chung;Pay-Liam Lin;Yu-Chieng Liou;Yi-Hui Chang;Yu-Chih Huang;Lin Yi-Sheng
title: Evaluating hygroscopic cloud-seeding effects by in-situ observation and real-case simulation
abstract:
•Observational evidence reveals both competition and tail effects during cloud seeding periods. •Simulations complement observations, showing that seeding enhances cloud activation and shifts raindrop sizes. 
 Evaluating the efficacy of cloud-seeding operations presents a complex challenge in atmospheric science, due to the multifaceted interactions between artificial nuclei, natural cloud processes, and local meteorological conditions. In this study, to assess cloud-seeding effects, several field experiments were conducted at Dongyanshan site (elevation 840 m) in northern Taiwan during northeast monsoon seasons from 2019 to 2022. The experiments utilized hygroscopic cloud seeding, leveraging the site's advantages of well-established instrumentation and a semi-closed, in-cloud environment. Our observational results indicate that the seeding agents can strengthen the competition effect, which causes an increase in liquid water content (LWC) and a decrease in water vapor mixing ratio, as well as the tail effect, which widens the drop size distribution (DSD). This important phenomenon of increased raindrop number concentration after cloud seeding was further confirmed by DSD observations at the upstream neighboring site, Xiayunping (elevation 340 m), where no cloud seeding was executed. Additionally, real-case model simulations were performed to further investigate the microphysical processes of cloud seeding. Simulation results indicate that cloud seeding enhances the cloud activation process (Pcact) while leading to the development of smaller cloud droplets, which decreases the auto-conversion process (Praut) of rain. Concurrently, an intensified accretion process (Pracw) increases raindrop diameter. These findings provide valuable insights into the mechanisms of cloud seeding, potentially improving the design and implementation of future weather modification strategies in similar atmospheric conditions.

explanation: 该研究论文主要关注中国东南沿海地区不同时间尺度上的干湿转换事件（DWTEs）的演变及其驱动机制。它使用标准化降水指数（SPI）来识别这些事件，并分析了北大西洋涛动（NAO）、厄尔尼诺-南方涛动（ENSO）和太平洋年代际涛动（PDO）等大规模气候振荡对DWTEs的影响。虽然该研究涉及气候变化和降水模式，但它与大气环境遥感技术（如空气质量监测、卫星观测或大气成分分析）没有直接或强烈的关联。
authors: Si-Qi Wu;Bo-Wen Zhang;Ying Chen;Zhen-Yu Zhang;Yi-Xing Yin;Xing-Wei Chen;Lu Gao;Hai-Jun Deng;Mei-Bing Liu
title: Variation of multiscale dry-wet transition events and their driving mechanisms in the southeastern coastal area of China
abstract:
•High-frequency, high-magnitude DWTEs occurred along the coast. •Frequency generally decreased while magnitude increased, with shorter durations in most regions at 30- and 90-day scales. •DWTE show stronger relationships with large-scale climate oscillations at higher quantiles. •The NAO predominantly influences inland areas, whereas the ENSO and the PDO have stronger effects on coastal regions. 
 sUnderstanding the dynamic evolution of dry-wet transition events (DWTEs) at different time scales is significant in water resources planning, agricultural development, and disaster risk reduction in a changing climate. The   southeast coastal region of China has been identified as a hot spot; however, the evolution of DWTEs at different time scales is unclear. This study identified DWTEs in China's   southeast coastal region at monthly, seasonal, and semi-annual scales from 1961 to 2020 based on the Standardized Precipitation Index (SPI) over 30-, 90- and 180-day moving window, and the spatiotemporal evolution of the DWTEs' frequency, duration, and magnitude are explored. The potential influence of large-scale climate oscillations, including the North Atlantic Oscillation (NAO), El Niño–Southern Oscillation (ENSO), and Pacific Decadal Oscillation (PDO) on the magnitude of DWTEs at the 30-day scale was assessed using Bayesian quantile regression. The results reveal (1) Extreme dry events were more prevalent and intense in the southern coastal area, whereas extreme wet events occurred predominantly and were more intense in the northern area. (2) High-frequency, high-magnitude DWTEs occurred along the coast at all time scales, and as the time scale increased, events with short duration shifted from the coast to the inland region. At the 30- and 90-day time scales, frequency generally decreased while magnitude increased, with the duration shortening in most regions. This indicates that the risk of DWTEs at short time scales has intensified over the past 60 years. (3) Strong large-scale climate oscillations significantly affected the DWTEs' magnitude. The NAO primarily impacted inland area, whereas ENSO and PDO exerted stronger influences on coastal area.

explanation: 该研究主要关注中国西南亚热带城市重庆在极端高湿条件下（雾-雨期）二次有机气溶胶（SOA）的形成、演变和清除过程。研究重点在于通过地面观测分析PM2.5的化学成分，特别是SOA的组成，以及液态水含量和氧化剂水平对SOA形成的影响。研究还探讨了湿清除过程对SOA的去除效率，并识别了SOA的主要来源区域。虽然该研究涉及大气成分分析，但主要侧重于化学过程和地面观测，与大气环境遥感技术（如卫星观测、大气成分遥感分析等）的直接关联性不强。
authors: Yifan Zhao;Zhier Bao;Xin Long;Yiliang Liu;Yan Han;Lingshuo Meng;Xiaoling Zeng;Lijuan Li;Xin Qi;Zhanliang Li;Chao Peng;Liuyi Zhang;Mulan Chen;Chongzhi Zhai;Yang Chen
title: Evolution of secondary organic aerosol under extremely high humidity conditions in urban areas of southwestern China: Formation and scavenging
abstract:
•Revealed the enhanced formation of SOA under high-humidity conditions in a subtropical urban environment. •Identified key precursors and formation pathways of SOA during fog-rain events. •Demonstrated the crucial role of wet scavenging in reducing PM2.5concentrations. •Clarified the impact of meteorological factors on SOA formation during the study period. •Provided insights into effective pollution control strategies for subtropical urban areas. 
 The formation and scavenging of secondary aerosol under extremely high humidity conditions (relative humidity >80 %) remained as an issue in subtropical urban areas. In order to evaluate the effects of aqueous-phase oxidation and wet removal on secondary organic aerosol (SOA) composition and dynamics, a field campaign, which mainly used a time-of-flight aerosol chemical speciation monitor (ToF-ACSM) to characterized the non-refractory PM2.5 (NR-PM2.5) composition, was carried out during autumn fog-rain periods (FRPs) in Chongqing, Southwestern China. The chemical composition of PM2.5 was characterized, and the factors impacting SOA formation were analyzed. The effects of regional transport on SOA were also investigated. The results showed that SOA, which included less oxidized oxygenated organic aerosol (LO-OOA) and more oxidized oxygenated organic aerosol (MO-OOA), dominated OA, contributing 80 % to total OA and 36 % to PM2.5. LO-OOA and MO-OOA concentrations increased with liquid water content (LWC) and oxidant levels (Ox), indicating aqueous-phase and photochemical pathways jointly promoted SOA formation. Compared to PreFRPs and PostFRPs, MO-OOA concentration decreased by 62 % and 1 % during FRPs, highlighting efficient wet scavenging. Notably, SOA exhibited higher removal efficiency than primary organic aerosol (POA), and MO-OOA tended to be more easily scavenged by fog and rain droplets than LO-OOA. Diurnal O/C ratios revealed enhanced nighttime oxidation under high humidity, while backward trajectories identified southern Chongqing as a key SOA source region. This study quantified the distinct scavenging efficiencies and formation processes of MO-OOA and LO-OOA under fog-rain conditions, bridging gaps in understanding SOA evolution in subtropical high-humidity environments.

explanation: 该研究论文主要关注区域气候模型（COSMO-CLM和ICON-CLM）在意大利的表现比较，特别是针对2023年的极端天气事件。研究侧重于评估ICON-CLM模型在模拟意大利复杂地形上的气象变量和极端降水事件方面的改进，并鼓励从COSMO-CLM模型过渡到ICON-CLM模型。该研究与大气环境遥感技术，如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析，没有直接关联。
authors: Leo Luca Loprieno;Mario Raffa;Angelo Campanale;Marianna Adinolfi;Paola Mercogliano
title: Comparative study of the COSMO and ICON models performances over Italy: Key insights from the impactful year 2023
abstract:
•CCLM and ICLM are compared over Italy for the year 2023 focusing on extreme events. •ICLM reduces the bias of daily meteorological variables over complex topography. •Extreme total precipitation is much closer to observations in ICLM than CCLM. •The findings encourage the transition of modelling activities from CCLM to ICLM. 
 This study presents a comparative analysis of the regional climate models COSMO-CLM (CCLM) and ICON-CLM (ICLM) over Italy, focusing on the year 2023. Given the widespread use of the high-resolution dataset VHR-REA_IT, produced by downscaling ERA5 reanalysis with CCLM at ~2.2 km over Italy, and the transition from CCLM to ICLM within the scientific communities (as the Consortium for Small-Scale Modelling COSMO and Climate Limited-area Modelling CLM), this work aims to assess the added value of using ICLM at convection-permitting scale over Italy during the recent impactful year 2023. Evaluation results and objective metrics, highlight a reduction in the warm bias of ICLM compared to CCLM with respect to the E-OBS gridded observation dataset, especially during the warmer months. Although CCLM shows a general good performance, ICLM improves the representation of daily accumulated precipitation in spring over territories with a complex orography and reduces the bias of wind speeds. Also, the diurnal cycles are generally improved. The ICLM added value is further proven by the analyses focusing on impactful events (two flooding events, a heatwave and a windstorm) hitting the Emilia-Romagna region during the year 2023. The evaluation indicates a general good agreement of ICLM outputs with gridded observations, supporting its adoption for future high-resolution downscaling reanalysis over Italy.

explanation: 该研究论文主要关注巴基斯坦极端降水事件的分类及其多尺度相互作用机制。论文通过自组织映射方法将巴基斯坦的极端降水事件分为六种类型，并深入研究了导致这些极端降水事件的关键天气系统的多尺度动力学机制。研究侧重于动能和有效势能的跨尺度传递，以及不同尺度上的斜压和正压不稳定性的作用。虽然该研究与大气现象有关，但它主要关注降水事件的分类和动力学机制，而不是大气环境遥感技术，如空气质量监测、卫星观测或大气成分分析。
authors: Taichen Feng;Hongjia Lei;Chunxuan Zhao;Yu Gu;Xuehua An;Zhiwei Zhu;Qianrong Ma;Guolin Feng
title: Classification of extreme precipitation events in Pakistan and their multiscale interaction mechanisms
abstract:
•Six types of EPEs are classified in Pakistan. Southern types (P1-P3) are more intense and prolonged, and northern types (P4-P6) are more frequent. •Large-scale circulations and multiscale energy transfers and make EPEs stronger. •The crucial circulation anomalies are powered by the basic- and intraseasonal-scale baroclinic and barotropic instability. 
 A self-organizing map (SOM) was employed to classify extreme precipitation events (EPEs) in Pakistan into six types with distinct characteristics and spatial distributions. Types P1–P3 were concentrated in the southern regions and types P4–P6 were concentrated in the northern regions. We further illuminated the multiscale interaction mechanisms involved in the development of key synoptic systems that generate the six types of EPEs (P1–P6). Cross-scale transfers of kinetic energy (KE) and available potential energy (APE) occurred in P1, resulting in baroclinic and barotropic instability in the basic- and intraseasonal-scale windows. The development of an anticyclonic anomaly over western Russia and the South Asian High (SAH) anticyclone system led to the most intense and protracted EPEs. P2 was characterized by a cyclonic anomaly over western Russia and anticyclonic anomalies over Central Asia and eastern Russia, persisting over local areas in the original and intraseasonal-scale fields to promote the synoptic transient wave train activity. The basic scale being dominant in the baroclinic instability led to the westward shift of the EPEs. The SAH and an active synoptic cyclonic dominated P3, with convergence and diabatic heating, which intensified the EPEs. Although the distributions and driving mechanisms of P4–P6 differed, their energy flows were similar to those of P3, dominated by synoptic-scale spatial transport and diabatic heating. Notably, the intraseasonal-scale baroclinic instability occurred in P6, leading to the most frequent EPEs. Our study investigates the multiscale dynamic mechanisms of EPEs, providing valuable insights for advancing its understanding and prediction in Pakistan.

explanation: 该研究论文主要探讨了过去一个世纪中，北极海冰（特别是巴伦支-喀拉海海冰浓度）与青藏高原气温之间的关系，并发现了这种关系存在年代际反转现象。研究表明，巴伦支-喀拉海海冰的减少会影响急流和罗斯贝波，从而改变北极与青藏高原之间的联系。此外，大西洋多年代际涛动（AMO）的不同阶段也会影响海冰减少对青藏高原气温的影响。总的来说，该研究侧重于气候变化背景下北极海冰对青藏高原气候的影响机制，与大气环境遥感技术（如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析）的直接关联性不强。
topic_words: ['Arctic sea ice', 'Tibetan Plateau temperature', 'Barents-Kara Sea ice concentration', 'Atlantic Multidecadal Oscillation', 'Arctic Oscillation', 'Jet streams', 'Rossby waves']
authors: Jiaqi Kang;Ruonan Zhang;Ruibo Lei;Qinglong You;Zhiyan Zuo;Wenjian Hua;Long Lin
title: Interdecadal reversal in the relationship between Arctic sea ice and the Tibetan Plateau temperature over the past century
abstract:
•Interdecadal reversal found in BKSIC-TPSAT relationship over the past century. •BKSIC loss modulates jet streams and Rossby waves, reversing the BKS-TP connection. •BKSIC loss drives TP thermal conditions under distinct AMO phase contexts. 
 Changes in Arctic sea ice have been shown to affect the climatic variability of the Tibetan Plateau (TP), but it remains unclear whether this Arctic-TP link has been stable over the past century. Using multiple reanalysis datasets (1900–2021), we found an interdecadal reversal in the relationship between winter Barents-Kara Sea ice concentration (BKSIC) and TP surface air temperature (TPSAT). In response to BKSIC loss, an out-of-phase pattern of “warm Arctic-cold TP” occurred during 1950–1975 (P1), while an in-phase pattern of “warm Arctic-warm TP” occurred during 1985–2021 (P2). The reversal of the BKSIC-TPSAT link is associated with changes in the position and strength of the subpolar and subtropical jet streams and quasi-stationary Rossby waves. During P1, the TPSAT was influenced by two distinct zonally oriented wave trains, associated with sea ice loss over the Greenland-Barents Kara Seas, the negative phase of the Atlantic Multidecadal Oscillation (AMO), and the positive phase of the Arctic Oscillation (AO). The north branch of the wave train propagates eastward along the intensified subpolar jet stream, while the south branch of the wave train originated from the North Atlantic and propagates eastward through the subtropical jet stream into the southern TP. In contrast, during P2, prominent BKSIC loss with positive AMO leads to a weakened subpolar jet stream, which favors the meridional propagation of the wave train into the southern TP. This study highlights the potential role of BKSIC in driving differing TP atmospheric thermal conditions in the context of distinct AMO phases.

explanation: 该论文主要关注利用静止气象卫星（Himawari-8/9）识别强对流云，并分析其与强对流天气的关系。研究重点在于开发算法以识别强对流云，并使用深度学习方法来预测强对流天气在强对流云中的发生。虽然使用了卫星数据，但其核心是天气预报和强对流天气的监测，而非大气环境遥感技术，如空气质量监测或大气成分分析。
authors: Yi Xu;Kaimin Sun;Fangyi Lv;Zhiqiang Bian;Xinbo Zhou;Shunxia Miao;Tao He
title: Identification of severe convective clouds and analysis of their relationship with severe convective weather based on Himawari-8/9 geostationary satellite
abstract:
•SCW exhibits three occurrence patterns: within SCCs, around SCCs, and isolated minority events. •SCW occurs mainly within the SCC and a 40 km buffer zone on its borders. •Identification results of SCC serve as indicative precursors for over 90 % of SCW events. •Deep learning approach achieved an 85 % accuracy rate in determining SCW occurrence within SCCs. 
 The occurrence of severe convective weather (SCW) often poses significant threats to socio-economic stability and public safety. Monitoring the evolution of convective clouds can provide critical support for timely severe weather warnings. We utilize Himawari-8/9 geostationary satellite imagery to identify severe convective clouds (SCCs) within large-scale regions through a multi-threshold sliding window (MTSW) algorithm, with validation using ground-based radar reflectivity data and real-world weather cases. Additionally, 507 SCW events were analyzed using Global Precipitation Measurement (GPM) data and European Centre for Medium-Range Weather Forecasts Reanalysis v5 (ERA5) datasets to investigate their relationship with the identified 12,177 SCCs. Finally, deep learning methods were further introduced to explore the quantitative correlation between SCCs and SCW. Key findings include: (1) Strong consistency between satellite-identified SCCs and high-reflectivity zones observed by ground-based radar; (2) The algorithm effectively detects convective clouds at various developmental stages, achieving an identification accuracy of 85 %; (3) Spatiotemporal analysis reveals that more than 90 % of severe convective weather (SCW) occurs within the coverage of SCCs and a 40 km buffer zone surrounding their boundaries, although the presence of SCCs does not necessarily lead to SCW; (4) By applying deep learning, the model attained a mean Intersection over Union (MIoU) score of 78 % in segmenting severe convective weather within SCCs. These findings enhance the application potential of geostationary satellites, deepen understanding of severe convective mechanisms, and improve forecasting precision.

explanation: 该论文主要研究雷电放电现象，特别是云内放电（IC）的特征。它利用高速摄像机记录的视频数据，分析了IC闪电的持续时间、传播模式以及是否存在类似于地闪的现象。研究重点在于雷电物理过程的观测和分析，与大气环境遥感技术（如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析）没有直接关系。因此，该论文与大气环境遥感技术的相关性较低。
authors: Tagianne P. da Silva;Marcelo M.F. Saba;Tom A. Warner;Ivan T. Cruz;Felipe de L. Mantovani;José C.O. Silva;Paola B. Lauria;Rasha U. Abbasi;Mark A. Stanley;Diego R.R. da Silva;Paul Krehbiel;Miguel Guimarães;Listz Araujo;Bill Rison;Dan Rodeheffer
title: High-speed camera observations of intracloud flashes
abstract:
•+ IC flashes represent 69 % of the occurrences and last 49 % longer than - IC flashes. •IC flashes can exhibit wave-type reflections and connecting leaders, like CG flashes. •RL exhibits three distinct propagation patterns along the lightning channel. •Luminosity analysis reveals variations in CC, including M-component-like features. 
 This study summarizes the characteristics of 190 intracloud flashes recorded by high-speed video cameras operating at framing rates up to 37,819 frames per second, between 2003 and 2023, in Brazil and the United States of America. The analyzed features include the presence of processes similar to continuing currents and M-components, the behavior of recoil leaders propagating through the intracloud lightning channels, and the possible existence of connecting leaders within intracloud flashes. By analyzing the high-speed videos, we identified several characteristics similar to those observed in cloud-to-ground flashes.Two types of intracloud flashes were identified according to the polarity of the leader propagating along the cloud base. Their duration was estimated by the camera and by an electric field sensor. By comparing these data, the accuracy of high-speed videos in determining intracloud flash durations was evaluated.

explanation: 该研究论文主要关注冰雹天气的时空演变特征，利用地面的冰雹报告和GPM卫星数据，分析了冰雹发生前后降水微物理参数（如质量加权平均直径Dm和广义截距参数Nw）与对流参数之间的关系。研究结果揭示了冰雹天气中降水粒子微物理过程的时空变化规律，并探讨了这些参数与冰雹云高之间的非线性关系。虽然使用了卫星数据，但该研究的重点在于冰雹的形成和演变机制，而非大气环境遥感技术，如空气质量监测或大气成分分析。
authors: Yujia Zhang;Xiang Ni
title: Spatiotemporal variability of precipitation characteristics in hailstorm based on the observations of spaceborne precipitation radar
abstract:
•Strong updrafts, large raindrops, and high reflectivity shift from northwest to southeast of hailstorms. •The vertical structure of precipitation characteristics in different regions of hailstorms varies across different periods. •The Dmand Zegenerally increase with HT20/40, but the relationships are nonlinear. 
 This study uses ground hail reports in the United States and Global Precipitation Measurement Core Observatory data from 2014 to 2022 to analyze the spatiotemporal evolutions of precipitation microphysical parameters (mass-weighted mean diameter (Dm), and generalized intercept parameter (Nw)) and its relationship with convective parameters during the two hours around hail. The results indicate that at 3 km above ground level, the regions with large raindrops, high reflectivity (Ze), high storm height and strong updrafts moved from northwest to southeast, indicating a typical hailstorm movement pattern. Vertically, the variations of Ze and Dm correlate well with their spatiotemporal variability at the 3 km. Regardless of altitude, Dm and Ze exhibited higher values in the northwestern sector prior to hail report time, while higher values shifted to the southeastern sector post-hail. Notably, Nw showed minimal temporal differences below 5 km, whereas above 5 km pre-hail Nw values were lower compared to post-hail. This suggests that different microphysical processes of precipitation particles may occur across different time periods and regions. Convective precipitation in hailstorm was primarily influenced by the collision-coalescence process, while stratiform precipitation primarily involved both break-up and collision-coalescence processes. Meanwhile, the height of 20/40 dBZ echo top (HT20/40) revealed nonlinear relationship with microphysical parameters. For example, the Dm at 3 km increased with HT40 when HT40 is less than 6 km, but changed a little when HT40 is larger than 6 km. These findings provide new insights into the microphysical processes surrounding hailstorms and contribute to improving hail prediction models.

explanation: 该研究论文主要关注复杂地形（四川盆地）中垂直风切变对重污染的影响，通过实地观测分析了风向和风速的垂直变化如何影响污染物的输送、扩散和滞留。虽然与大气环境相关，但论文侧重于气象因素对空气污染的影响，而非大气遥感技术本身，例如空气质量监测、卫星观测或大气成分分析。因此，该论文与大气环境遥感技术关联性不强。
topic_words: ['wind shear', 'air pollution', 'boundary layer meteorology', 'Sichuan Basin', 'subsidence motion']
authors: Suping Zhao;Ye Yu;Jianjun He;Tong Zhang;Longxiang Dong;Xiaoling Zhang;Shaofeng Qi
title: Frequently strong boundary-layer vertical wind shear dominates heavy air pollution over the typical deep basin
abstract:
•A clockwise turning of the wind with the height was more frequent, corresponding to heavy pollution. •The surface heavy pollution was jointly influenced by low-level WDS and WSS. •Elevated wind-directional shear enhanced turbulence to transport downwards secondary pollutants. •WSS more easily triggered subsidence motion to trap more pollutants inside the basin. 
 Vertical wind shear frequently occurs in complex terrain (basin and sloped terrain). However, compared with thermodynamic (temperature inversion) variables, the modulation of dynamic (wind shear) variables on air pollution is poorly understood due to scarce in-situ observations at complex terrain. In order to reveal the issues, we conducted the first collaborative field experiment of Boundary-Layer Meteorology and Pollution at western Sichuan Basin (BLMP-SCB) at a rural site from December 2018 to January 2019. A clockwise turning of the wind with the height was more frequent, especially for the rotation smaller than 20 degrees, which corresponded to the heavy air pollution near the ground surface. The surface heavy air pollution was jointly influenced by both low-level wind-directional shear and speed shear above that layer, especially the configuration of southeasterly winds below 1.0 km above sea level (regional transport) and increased southwesterly winds with height above the height (subsidence motion). The elevated wind-directional shear enhanced mechanical turbulence to transport downwards secondary pollutants to upper atmospheric boundary layer from the higher layer of air. The increased wind speed with height more easily triggered subsidence motion to trap more pollutants inside the basin. The work was helpful for fully understanding the role of meteorological variables in the formation and development of heavy air pollution at complex terrain, which will be favorable for making targeted pollution prevention and control measures at complex terrain.

explanation: 这篇论文主要关注使用机器学习方法（XGBoost）预测干旱和半干旱地区累积风速小时数，目的是为了更好地评估土壤风蚀的风险。论文比较了模型预测结果与气象站观测数据以及ERA5-Land再分析数据的差异，发现该模型在预测累积风速小时数方面表现更好，尤其是在气象站数据稀疏的区域。该研究主要应用于土壤风蚀预测和相关环境研究，与大气环境遥感技术（如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析）关联不大。
topic_words: ['Wind speed prediction', 'Soil wind erosion', 'XGBoost', 'Reanalysis data (ERA5-Land)', 'Arid and semi-arid regions']
authors: Xintong Wu;Hong Cheng;Bo Wu;Ning Jiang;Yongmei Huang
title: A regional XGBoost-based predictive model for the cumulative hours of wind speed levels
abstract:
•An XGBoost-based model for predicting cumulative wind speed hours was developed. •Model predictions better matched weather station measurements than ERA5-Land data. •The developed model performed well in cross-time and cross-location applications. •The model better reflected spatial details than kriging where stations were sparse. 
 Climate change has intensified extreme droughts and strong winds in arid and semi-arid regions, accelerating soil wind erosion, dust emissions, and related environmental problems. Wind is the primary driver of soil wind erosion, with both speed and cumulative duration determining the intensity of the erosion process. Accurately characterizing regional wind speed and its cumulative duration is therefore essential for understanding the spatial distribution of soil wind erosion. Previous studies have mainly relied on weather station observations; however, their limited coverage, low temporal resolution and uneven spatial distribution have introduced significant uncertainties in regional assessments. To address these limitations, long-term reanalysis wind speed datasets have been developed, though their accuracy still needs further evaluation. In this paper, wind speed data from weather stations and from the ERA5-Land reanalysis product in the wind erosion region of northern China were collected to develop a predictive model for cumulative wind speed hours above the 5 m/s threshold, based on the XGBoost method combined with SHAP (SHapley Additive exPlanations) analysis. The results showed that, compared to the cumulative wind speed hours derived from the ERA5-Land product, the model predictions more closely aligned with corresponding weather station measurements. Across different months, the explained variance for cumulative wind speed hours in the test set increased from an initial range of 10–53 % to 60–75 %, accompanied by reductions in mean absolute error (MAE) by 0.15–0.67 h and root mean square error (RMSE) by 1.11–2.14 h. The model also performed well in both cross-time and cross-location applications, explaining 72 % of the variation in cumulative wind speed hours in the validation set. This outperformed the ERA5-Land product, which accounted for only 59 % of the variation, and significantly reduced the associated prediction errors. The constructed XGBoost model was further used to simulate the cumulative wind speed hours in the study region in 2020. Its spatial simulation accuracy was comparable to that of the ordinary kriging method, with superior performance in capturing spatial variation in areas with sparse weather station coverage. The results provide reliable data on the cumulative wind speed duration required for large-scale soil wind erosion prediction and related environmental research.

explanation: 该研究论文主要关注韩国秋季降雨模式的变化，特别是由于热带气旋影响而出现的新降雨高峰。研究探讨了西太平洋副热带高压的延迟撤退、海面温度升高以及水汽输送增强等因素如何导致韩国热带气旋降雨增加。研究强调了秋季降雨变化对农业的影响，但并未涉及大气环境遥感技术，如空气质量监测、卫星观测或大气成分分析。因此，该论文与大气环境遥感技术的关联性不强。
authors: Hee-Ae Kim;Chang-Hoi Ho;Minhee Chang;Jinwon Kim
title: Emergence of autumn rainy season in Korea due to tropical cyclone influence
abstract:
•We identify a new autumn rainy season in Korea with increased tropical cyclone (TC) rainfall since 1997/1998. •The delayed retreat of the western North Pacific subtropical high shifts TC tracks westward, increasing impact on Korea. •Warm seas, enhanced moisture transport, and weakened upper-level westerlies have intensified TC rainfall. 
 Autumn in Korea, following the peak rainy season in summer, is of a great importance as it coincides with the intensive harvesting of crops and fruits. Hence, autumn rainfall critically affects agricultural production in Korea. This study shows the emergence of new rainfall peaks in autumn, leading to potentially significant agricultural damages. In the monthly period from September 10 to October 10, the total rainfall in the recent period (150 mm for 1998–2023) has increased by 44 mm compared to the previous period (106 mm for 1979–1997), averaged over 61 stations. Heavy rainfall days (≥ 100 mm day−1) have also occurred more frequently. The most plausible mechanism for these changes is the delayed retreat of the western North Pacific subtropical high in autumn which results in westward shift of tropical cyclone (TC) tracks and increased number of days on which Korea is affected by TCs. In addition, rising sea surface temperatures (0.5–1.0°C) in the western North Pacific and the South China Sea appear to be related to increased TC-induced heavy rainfall in Korea. Enhanced low-level moisture transports from these warm oceanic areas toward Korea, combined with upper-level wind divergence, are likely to have intensified the conditions for the TC-induced heavy rainfall. This study highlights the need for further research and public awareness of the changing autumn rainfall patterns and their impacts on agriculture and infrastructure.

explanation: 该研究论文主要关注全球气象站网络捕捉热浪的能力。它使用ERA5-Land再分析数据集的高分辨率气温数据，通过时空连续事件追踪方法获取热浪事件的空间尺度。然后，将热浪的空间尺度与气象站网络的平均距离进行比较，以评估气象站网络是否足以捕捉热浪。论文引入了代表性比率作为衡量指标，描述气象站网络在多大程度上捕捉了附近的热浪事件。虽然该研究使用了温度数据，但它主要关注地面气象站的观测能力和热浪的空间特征，与大气环境遥感技术（如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析）的关联性不强。
authors: Linghong Chen;Kaicun Wang
title: Can global weather station network capture heatwaves?
abstract:
•The global density of weather stations is described as an overall increase. •In contiguous United States and Europethe heatwaves can be captured by the weather station network from 1950 to 2024. •In some regions of Latin America and Africa, the heatwaves cannot be captured by the weather station network at 1950s,. 
 Heatwaves are documented to exert significant impacts on both ecosystems and human societies. Ground-based observation of temperature could provide fundamental data to acquire heatwave characteristics like intensity, frequency and duration, but are challenging to get information about event-based spatial area. Meanwhile, Spatial and temporal gaps in observational heatwave records also receive increasing attention, but quantitative approaches remain lacking. Here we use the high-resolution air temperatures from the ERA5-Land reanalysis dataset (0.1° × 0.1) from 1950 to 2024, to acquire spatial scale of heatwave events using a spatiotemporally contiguous events tracking method. We compare spatial scale of heatwaves and the average distance of weather station network, which depicts the density, to address whether the station network is sufficient to capture heatwaves. The representativeness ratio was introduced as a metric describing how well the network density at a station captures nearby heatwave events in a given summer. We find the heatwaves at smaller scale (< 100 km) exhibit significant increase from 1950 to 2024, especially at nighttime. Meanwhile, there has been a continuously increase in the spatial density of worldwide weather stations. The coupling of these two trends drives spatially heterogeneous temporal evolutions of representativeness ratios in regional networks. The contiguous United States and Europe have consistently maintained high representativeness ratio (> 80 %), while some regions in South America and Africa exhibited poor representativeness ratio in the 1850s (< 20 %) but show significant improvement in recent periods (> 60 %). In these regions, the temporal changes in representativeness ratio may lead to overestimation of observed trends of heatwaves.

explanation: 该论文主要关注使用无人机系统进行人工降雨增强技术的研究。它探讨了无人机在云播撒方面的应用，包括无人机的类型、传感器、地面站设备、通信协议以及相关的算法和控制方法。虽然涉及大气数据收集，但其重点在于提高降水效率，而非大气环境遥感技术的应用，如空气质量监测、卫星观测或大气成分分析。
topic_words: ['cloud seeding', 'precipitation enhancement', 'unmanned aircraft systems (UAS)', 'atmospheric data collection', 'cloud seedability algorithms']
authors: Muhammad Kazim;Rana Azzam;Roelof Burger;Youssef Wehbe;Yahya Zweiri;Lakmal Seneviratne;Naoufel Werghi
title: Unmanned aircraft systems for precipitation enhancement: Advancements, challenges, and future prospects
abstract:
•This paper reviews the evolution of Unmanned Aircraft Systems (UAS) in cloud seeding, from early trials to advanced autonomous technologies, and analyzes key historical milestones and innovations in seeding methodologies. •Critically compares cloud seeding aircraft and small UAS platforms, evaluating specifications, sensor integrations, performance, and operational efficiency. •Examines UAS-mounted sensors for high-resolution atmospheric data collection and reviews advanced path planning, estimation, and autonomous control methods that improve cloud seeding precision. •Analyzes ground station and communication system advancements enabling autonomous dispersal and real-time data integration, alongside software frameworks for dynamic cloud data acquisition and analysis. •Highlights key challenges, regulatory limits, flight endurance, and sensor miniaturization outlining future directions and synthesizing progress and research needs in UAS-driven precipitation enhancement. 
 The increasing demand for freshwater resources has intensified interest in precipitation enhancement technologies, particularly in arid and semi-arid regions such as the United Arab Emirates (UAE). Traditional cloud seeding methods that utilize crewed aircrafts have limitations in terms of safety, cost, and operational flexibility. Unmanned Aircraft Systems (UAS) offer promising complementary platforms by providing enhanced maneuverability, reduced risks, and cost-effectiveness. Furthermore, UAS can gather in situ high-resolution atmospheric data that are currently inaccessible via remote sensing techniques or crewed aircraft. This article provides a detailed introduction, history of UAS usage, and recent advancements in small UAS for cloud seeding, as well as presents the impacts, challenges, and future prospects. It then examines the different types of aircraft used for cloud seeding and discusses their specifications, functions, and sensors, as well as their pros and cons. Subsequently, it provides a comprehensive analysis of the small UAS used for precipitation enhancement, focusing on the types of small UAS suitable for cloud seeding, onboard equipment and sensors, ground station equipment and software, communication protocols, and methodologies, such as cloud seedability algorithms (CSA), path planning, and control autonomy. The integration of the Rapid Evaluation of Convective Cell Environments for Seeding (RECCES) algorithm built on top of the Lidar Radar Open Software Environment (LROSE) is also discussed for real-time cloud data acquisition and analysis, which are important for UAS cloud seeding missions. Advanced control-and-command communication systems between the UAS and ground stations are discussed, along with the regulatory requirements of the UAS for cloud seeding. The advantages, advancements, and challenges of UAS in precipitation enhancement are highlighted, and future prospects such as swarm technology, advanced sensor integration, centralized autonomy, de-icing technology, Artificial Intelligence (AI) and Machine Learning, regulatory framework development, and environmental and ethical considerations are proposed in detail to pave the way for more efficient and effective UAS-based precipitation enhancement for cloud seeding operations.

explanation: 根据提供的标题《火星狂热与科学权威的建立》和摘要（摘要为空），该论文主要关注的是对火星的狂热以及这种狂热如何影响科学权威的建立。这似乎是一个历史或社会学研究，探讨了人们对火星的兴趣如何塑造科学领域的权威性和认知。与大气环境遥感技术（如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析）没有直接关系。因此，该论文与大气环境遥感技术的相关性较低。
authors: Dov Greenbaum
title: Mars mania and the making of scientific authority

explanation: 根据提供的标题《装死：动物如何理解死亡》和摘要，该研究论文主要关注动物行为学和动物认知领域，特别是动物对死亡概念的理解。它与大气环境遥感技术，如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析，没有直接关联。因此，该论文不属于大气环境遥感技术的范畴。
authors: Authors not available
title: Playing Possum: How Animals Understand Death

explanation: 根据提供的标题《不确定时期的学术领导力》和摘要为空，该论文主要关注的是学术领导力，而非大气环境遥感技术。因此，它与空气质量监测、卫星观测或大气成分分析等领域无关。论文探讨的可能是学术机构在面临挑战或变革时，领导者如何有效地管理和引导，与大气环境遥感技术没有直接联系。
authors: Susan Elrod
title: Academic leadership in uncertain times

explanation: 该研究论文主要关注森林化（植树造林和重新造林）对减缓气候变化的影响，通过生物量和土壤吸收碳。论文重点在于评估全球森林化在不同土地可用性限制下的碳封存潜力，并分析了现有政策承诺对森林化减缓气候变化效果的限制。虽然气候变化与大气环境相关，但该研究并未直接涉及大气环境遥感技术，如空气质量监测、卫星观测或大气成分分析。因此，该论文与大气环境遥感技术的关联性较弱。
authors: Yijie Wang;Yakun Zhu;Susan C. Cook-Patton;Wenjuan Sun;Wen Zhang;Philippe Ciais;Tingting Li;Pete Smith;Wenping Yuan;Xudong Zhu;Josep G. Canadell;Xiaopeng Deng;Yifan Xu;Hao Xu;Chao Yue;Zhangcai Qin
title: Land availability and policy commitments limit global climate mitigation from forestation
abstract: Forestation (afforestation and reforestation) could mitigate climate change by sequestering carbon within biomass and soils. However, global mitigation from forestation remains uncertain owing to varying estimates of carbon sequestration rates (notably in soil) and land availability. In this study, we developed global maps of soil carbon change that reveal carbon gains and losses with forestation, primarily in the topsoil. Constraining land availability to avoid unintended albedo-induced warming and safeguard water and biodiversity (389 million hectares available for forestation globally) would sequester 39.9 petagrams of carbon by 2050, substantially below previous estimates. This estimate drops to 12.5 petagrams of carbon with land further limited to existing policy commitments (120 million hectares). Achieving greater mitigation requires expanding dedicated forestation areas and strengthening commitments from nations with considerable but untapped potential.

explanation: 该研究论文主要关注利用机器学习方法评估基因变异的疾病渗透率，并将其应用于精准医疗。它涉及电子健康记录、外显子组数据和遗传变异分析，旨在更准确地量化疾病风险。与大气环境遥感技术（如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析）没有直接关系。
authors: Iain S. Forrest;Ha My T. Vy;Ghislain Rocheleau;Daniel M. Jordan;Ben O. Petrazzini;Girish N. Nadkarni;Judy H. Cho;Mythily Ganapathi;Kuan-Lin Huang;Wendy K. Chung;Ron Do
title: Machine learning–based penetrance of genetic variants
abstract: Accurate variant penetrance estimation is crucial for precision medicine. We constructed machine learning (ML) models for 10 diseases using 1,347,298 participants with electronic health records, then applied them to an independent cohort with linked exome data. Resulting probabilities were used to evaluate ML penetrance of 1648 rare variants in 31 autosomal dominant disease-predisposition genes. ML penetrance was variable across variant classes, but highest for pathogenic and loss-of-function variants, and was associated with clinical outcomes and functional data. Compared with conventional case-versus-control approaches, ML penetrance provided refined quantitative estimates and aided the interpretation of variants of uncertain significance and loss-of-function variants by delineating clinical trajectories over time. By leveraging ML and deep phenotyping, we present a scalable approach to accurately quantify disease risk of variants.

explanation: 该研究论文主要关注转录因子SP5和SP8在哺乳动物胚胎中驱动初级纤毛形成的作用。它探讨了这些转录因子如何调节纤毛的形成和基因表达，以及它们的缺失如何导致纤毛异常，从而影响胚胎发育。该研究与大气环境遥感技术（如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析）没有直接关系。
authors: Yinwen Liang;Richard Koche;Ravindra B. Chalamalasetty;Daniel N. Stephen;Mark W. Kennedy;Zhimin Lao;Yunong Pang;Ying-Yi Kuo;Moonsup Lee;Francisco Pereira Lobo;Xiaofeng Huang;Anna-Katerina Hadjantonakis;Terry P. Yamaguchi;Kathryn V. Anderson;Alexandra L. Joyner
title: Transcription factors SP5 and SP8 drive primary cilia formation in mammalian embryos
abstract: Although specific transcription factors (TFs) are known to regulate cell fate decisions, the degree to which they can stimulate formation of specific cell organelles is less clear. We used a multiomics comparison of the transcriptomes of ciliated and unciliated embryonic cells to identify TFs up-regulated in ciliated cells. We also used conditional genetics in mouse embryos and stem cells and found that the TFs SP5 and SP8 regulate cilia formation and gene expression. In embryos lackingSp5andSp8, primary and motile cilia were shorter than normal and reduced in number across cell types, contributing to situs inversus and hydrocephalus. Moreover, expression of SP8 was sufficient to induce primary cilia in unciliated cells. This work will facilitate the study of cilia assembly using stem cell models and promote further understanding of human ciliopathies.

explanation: 该研究论文主要关注黄石公园自由迁徙的大型野牛种群对生态系统的影响，特别是对碳和氮循环的影响。研究评估了野牛对植被生产力、养分循环和景观营养质量的影响。虽然研究涉及碳和氮，但其重点在于生态系统功能和恢复，而不是大气环境遥感技术，如空气质量监测、卫星观测或大气成分分析。因此，该论文与大气环境遥感技术没有直接关联。
authors: Chris Geremia;E. William Hamilton;Jerod A. Merkle
title: Yellowstone’s free-moving large bison herds provide a glimpse of their past ecosystem function
abstract: Although momentum is building to restore bison across North America, most efforts focus on small, managed herds, leaving unclear how large, migrating herds shape landscapes and whether their effects enhance or degrade ecosystems. We assessed carbon and nitrogen dynamics across the northern Yellowstone ecosystem, where one of the last remaining large migratory populations resides. Bison stabilized net aboveground production while accelerating nitrogen turnover, increasing aboveground nitrogen pools while carbon pools remained stable, which improved landscape nutritional quality. Effects were strongest in wet, nutrient-rich habitats that received higher bison densities and grazing than is recommended in rangeland management, while soil and plant conditions suggested landscape resilience. Restoration should embrace heterogeneity in densities and effects across habitats and spatial scales beyond those guiding most current recovery efforts.

explanation: 该研究论文的标题和摘要主要关注脑干镇痛回路的体感拓扑组织。它探讨了导水管周围灰质（PAG）在不同身体部位诱发镇痛反应的空间特异性，以及PAG如何调节疼痛反应。因此，该论文与大气环境遥感技术（如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析）没有直接关系。
authors: Lewis S. Crawford;Fernando A. Tinoco Mendoza;Rebecca V. Robertson;Noemi Meylakh;Paul M. Macey;Kirsty Bannister;Tor D. Wager;Vaughan G. Macefield;Kevin A. Keay;Luke A. Henderson
title: Somatotopic organization of brainstem analgesic circuitry
abstract: The lateral periaqueductal gray (lPAG) evokes somatotopically appropriate defensive behaviors, including an analgesia that allows the animal to escape or fight unimpeded. Whether the lPAG and its descending targets are also able to drive somatotopically specific analgesic responses is not known. In this work, we performed ultrahigh-field functional magnetic resonance imaging of the lPAG in 93 participants during a placebo analgesia paradigm performed at different body locations. We found that analgesic responses are somatotopically organized in the lPAG and its descending outputs to the rostral ventromedial medulla. These data show that the PAG can regulate analgesic responses in a highly spatially localized manner and thus has the ability to mediate body site–selective control over pain.

explanation: 该论文主要研究UBR4复合物的结构和功能，UBR4是一种在真核细胞蛋白质质量控制中起关键作用的E4泛素连接酶。研究通过冷冻电镜分析揭示了UBR4与其辅助因子KCMF1和CALM1形成的巨大环状结构，并阐明了UBR4如何结合底物并延伸赖氨酸-48特异性泛素链。该研究与大气环境遥感技术（如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析）没有直接关系，主要关注细胞生物学和蛋白质质量控制机制。
authors: Daniel B. Grabarczyk;Julian F. Ehrmann;Paul Murphy;Woo Seok Yang;Robert Kurzbauer;Lillie E. Bell;Luiza Deszcz;Jana Neuhold;Alexander Schleiffer;Alexandra Shulkina;Juyeon Lee;Jin Seok Shin;Anton Meinhart;Gijs A. Versteeg;Eszter Zavodszky;Hyun Kyu Song;Ramanujan S. Hegde;Tim Clausen
title: Architecture of the UBR4 complex, a giant E4 ligase central to eukaryotic protein quality control
abstract: Eukaryotic cells have evolved sophisticated quality control mechanisms to eliminate aggregation-prone proteins that compromise cellular health. Central to this defense is the ubiquitin-proteasome system, where UBR4 acts as an essential E4 ubiquitin ligase, amplifying degradation marks on defective proteins. Cryo–electron microscopy analysis of UBR4 in complex with its cofactors KCMF1 and CALM1 reveals a massive 1.3-megadalton ring structure, featuring a central substrate-binding arena and flexibly attached catalytic units. Our structure shows how UBR4 binds substrate and extends lysine-48–specific ubiquitin chains. Efficient substrate targeting depends on both preubiquitination and specific N-degrons, with KCMF1 acting as a key substrate filter. The architecture of the E4 megacomplex is conserved across eukaryotes, but species-specific adaptations allow UBR4 to perform its precisely tuned quality control function in diverse cellular environments.

explanation: 这篇论文主要关注的是量子互联网的架构，特别是如何利用集成光子技术在现有光纤网络上高效地进行量子纠缠分发。它强调了经典控制在量子网络中的作用，通过经典信头的精确同步和实时误差缓解来保持量子态的完整性。该研究与大气环境遥感技术，如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析，没有直接关系。
authors: Yichi Zhang;Robert Broberg;Alan Zhu;Gushu Li;Li Ge;Jonathan M. Smith;Liang Feng
title: Classical-decisive quantum internet by integrated photonics
abstract: Classical and quantum technologies have traditionally been viewed as orthogonal, with classical systems being deterministic and quantum systems inherently probabilistic. This distinction hinders the development of a scalable quantum internet even as the global internet continues expanding. We report a classical-decisive quantum internet architecture in which the integration of quantum information into advanced photonic technologies enables efficient entanglement distribution over a commercially deployed fiber network. On-chip precise synchronization between classical headers and quantum payloads enables dynamic routing and networking of high-fidelity entanglement guided by classical light. The quantum states are preserved through real-time error mitigation, relying solely on classical signal readout without disturbing quantum information. These classical-decisive features demonstrate a practical path to a scalable quantum internet using existing network infrastructure and operating systems.

explanation: 该研究论文主要关注白色脂肪组织中巨噬细胞对脂肪干细胞分化的调控作用，以及它们在肥胖发生发展中的作用。论文研究了特定巨噬细胞亚群（sATMs）如何通过TGFβ1信号通路影响脂肪干细胞的分化方向，并探讨了这些巨噬细胞在调控脂肪组织扩张和产热方面的作用。该研究与大气环境遥感技术，如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析等，没有直接关联。
authors: Xiaotong Yu;Yanan Hu;Hwee Ying Lim;Ziyi Li;Diego Adhemar Jaitin;Katharine Yang;Wan Ting Kong;Jiaqian Xu;David Alejandro Bejarano;Mathilde Bied;Lucie Orliaguet;Gowshika Rengasamy;Zachary Chow;Christopher Zhe Wei Lee;Josephine Lum;Jing Tian;Xiao-Meng Zhang;Honghao Liu;Shu Wen Tan;Jinmiao Chen;Peter See;Yuin-Han Loh;Benoit Malleret;Sonia Baig;M. Shabeer M. Yassin;Sue-Anne Ee Shiow Toh;Bernard Malissen;Xiujun Fu;Kenji Kabashima;Lai Guan Ng;Camille Blériot;Zhaoyuan Liu;Lingling Sheng;Dan-Ning Zheng;Junwen Qu;Nicolas Venteclef;Bing Su;Ido Amit;Andreas Schlitzer;Veronique Angeli;Florent Ginhoux;Svetoslav Chakarov
title: Septal LYVE1+ macrophages control adipocyte stem cell adipogenic potential
abstract: Tissue macrophages reside in anatomically distinct subtissular niches that shape their identity and function. In white adipose tissue (WAT), we identified three macrophage populations with distinct localization, turnover, and phenotypes. Septal adipose tissue macrophages (sATMs), marked by CD209b and lymphatic vessel endothelial hyaluronan receptor 1, were long-lived and positioned in close proximity to adipocyte stem cells (ASCs) within the WAT septum. Within this shared niche, sATMs instructed the differentiation of ASCs into white adipocytes through transforming growth factor–β1 (TGFβ1). Depletion of sATMs, or the selective loss of TGFβ1 within tissue-resident macrophages, redirected ASC fate toward thermogenic adipocytes, enhancing WAT beiging and protecting against diet-induced obesity. These findings highlight the role of a discrete, anatomically defined macrophage population that governs ASC fate and orchestrates adipose tissue expansion.

explanation: 该研究论文主要关注河流入海口区域的碱度稳定性，探讨通过地球化学方法进行二氧化碳移除（CDR）的可行性。研究通过实验模拟不同盐度和季节条件下，增加碱度对水体的影响，并评估了易北河河口吸收额外碱度的潜力。虽然该研究涉及二氧化碳，但其重点在于水体化学和地球化学过程，与大气环境遥感技术（如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析）没有直接关联。
authors: Mingyang Tian;Jens Hartmann;Niels Suitner;Thorben Amann;Stephan Kempe;Carl Lim;Charly A Moras
title: Stability of alkalinity in the land-ocean transition zone: a geochemical CDR perspective for the Elbe River, Germany
abstract: Carbon dioxide removal (CDR) strategies like enhanced weathering and river/ocean alkalinity enhancement have been suggested to increase alkalinity in rivers, coastal areas, and eventually oceans. The effectiveness and sustainability of these CDR approaches depend on the persistence of added alkalinity, since exceeding certain Ω-thresholds for a given water composition may lead to carbonates formation, causing the loss of previously added alkalinity. In this research, stability of alkalinity was tested using incubation experiments with Elbe estuary freshwater from two seasons (March and August). Alkalinity was increased up to 4000 μmol kgw−1, with varying salinity from 0 to 16. This study shows that the stability of alkalinity depends on the presence and quantity of suspended particles, seasonality of water chemistry, and salinity. Based on the experimental data, the Elbe estuary may take up additional alkalinity in the freshwater part, corresponding to ∼3.0 MtCO2 yr−1 being transported towards the North Sea. Estimates of alkalinity additions from the 1970s to 2010s show a decreasing potential due to changes in pCO2 and pH. The upper geochemical limit for transporting additional alkalinity through estuarine systems serves as a critical boundary. Environmentally feasible levels may be lower than identified here and depend on environmental regulations.

explanation: 该研究论文主要关注气候缓解技术领域新兴价值链中的创新评估，通过分析北美地区早期阶段的私人投资数据，识别了气候技术领域的五个不同产品集群，并探讨了这些集群内的创新模式。论文侧重于能源效率、能源存储和农业等气候技术领域，分析了不同领域的投资趋势和创新特点，旨在为气候技术扩展的政策设计提供参考，通过识别资金不足的产品集群，支持整个价值链的发展，而不仅仅是最终产品。该研究与大气环境遥感技术（如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析）关联不大，主要关注气候技术的商业模式和投资策略。
topic_words: ['climate-tech', 'climate-mitigating technology', 'early-stage private investments', 'nascent value chains', 'product clusters', 'energy efficiency', 'energy storage', 'agriculture']
authors: Zachary H Thomas;Ellen D Williams;Kavita Surana;Morgan R Edwards
title: Assessing innovation in the nascent value chains of climate-mitigating technologies
abstract: Accelerating climate-mitigating technology, or climate-tech, innovation in the formative phase of the technology life cycle is crucial to meeting climate policy goals. During this period, firms create value across a broad set of products related to hardware, software, and services. We conceptualize this as a nascent value chain, operationalize this concept by identifying a set of product clusters, and explore the patterns of innovation within and across them. Specifically, we analyze 14 climate-tech sectors using a dataset of 12 929 early-stage private investments in 3662 North American firms between 2006 and 2021. Descriptions of these firms reveal that innovation occurs in five distinct product clusters across the value chain. Within this dataset, only 15% of firms develop end products (i.e., downstream products bought by consumers), while 59% support these end products through components, manufacturing processes, or optimization products, and 26% develop business services. The temporal evolution of investments in these product clusters reveals three patterns of innovation among climate-tech sectors: maturing innovation (e.g., energy efficiency), characterized by coalescence around the dominant design of an end product with an increasing share of investments in optimization and services; ongoing innovation (e.g., energy storage), characterized by multiple waves of investments in evolving products enabled by flexible policy frameworks; and emerging innovation (e.g., agriculture), characterized by recent growth in investments across most product clusters and spillovers from other sectors. These patterns of innovation indicate ways that firms can add value to new climate-tech as it develops from the formative phase to the growth phase. An understanding of nascent value chains can inform policy design that supports climate-tech scaling by identifying underfunded product clusters and supporting development of a full value chain rather than only end products.

explanation: 该研究论文主要关注亚北极地区冬季颗粒物中的光化学反应，特别是棕色碳（BrC）在吸收阳光后产生的光氧化剂如何影响二次硫酸盐和二次有机气溶胶的形成。研究通过模拟实验测量了颗粒物提取物中三种光氧化剂的浓度，并建立了模型来预测光氧化剂的产生速率。虽然该研究与大气成分有关，但它侧重于化学过程而非遥感技术或卫星观测，因此与大气环境遥感技术的关联性不强。
topic_words: ['photochemistry', 'brown carbon', 'photooxidants', 'secondary sulfate formation', 'secondary organic aerosol formation', 'winter pollution', 'PM2.5']
authors: Laura M. D. Heinlein;Junwei He;Michael Oluwatoyin Sunday;Fangzhou Guo;James Campbell;Allison Moon;Sukriti Kapur;Ting Fang;Kasey Edwards;Meeta Cesler-Maloney;Alyssa J. Burns;Jack Dibb;William Simpson;Manabu Shiraiwa;Becky Alexander;Jingqiu Mao;James H. Flynn III;Jochen Stutz;Cort Anastasio
title: Surprisingly robust photochemistry in subarctic particles during winter: evidence from photooxidants
abstract:
High-latitude cities like Fairbanks, Alaska, experience severe wintertime pollution episodes. While conventional wisdom holds that oxidation is slow under these conditions, field measurements find oxidized products in particles. To explore this, we measured oxidants in aqueous extracts of winter particles from Fairbanks. We find high concentrations of oxidants during illumination experiments, indicating that particle photochemistry can be significant even in high latitudes during winter. 
 Subarctic cities notoriously experience severe winter pollution episodes with fine particle (PM2.5) concentrations above 35 µg m−3, the US Environmental Protection Agency (EPA) 24 h standard. While winter sources of primary particles in Fairbanks, Alaska, have been studied, the chemistry driving secondary particle formation is elusive. Biomass burning is a major source of wintertime primary particles, making the PM2.5 rich in light-absorbing brown carbon (BrC). When BrC absorbs sunlight, it produces photooxidants – reactive species potentially important for secondary sulfate and secondary organic aerosol formation – yet photooxidant measurements in high-latitude PM2.5 remain scarce. During the winter of 2022 Alaskan Layered Pollution And Chemical Analysis (ALPACA) field campaign in Fairbanks, we collected PM filters, extracted the filters into water, and exposed the extracts to simulated sunlight to characterize the production of three photooxidants: oxidizing triplet excited states of BrC, singlet molecular oxygen, and hydroxyl radical. Next, we used our measurements to model photooxidant production in highly concentrated aerosol liquid water. While conventional wisdom indicates photochemistry is limited during high-latitude winters, we find that BrC photochemistry is significant: we predict high triplet and singlet oxygen daytime particle concentrations up to 2×10-12 and 3×10-11 M, respectively, with moderate hydroxyl radical concentrations up to 5×10-15 M. Although our modeling predicts that triplets account for 0.4 %–10 % of daytime secondary sulfate formation, particle photochemistry cumulatively dominates, generating 76 % of daytime secondary sulfate formation, largely due to in-particle hydrogen peroxide, which contributes 25 %–54 %. Finally, we estimate triplet production rates year-round, revealing the highest rates in late winter when Fairbanks experiences severe pollution and in summer when wildfires generate BrC.
